name: Ext_R3_Contract_securityLabel
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Contract.securityLabel for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.securityLabel from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Security Labels that define affected resources
element.definition: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:Contract element `Contract.securityLabel` to R4:Contract element ``

element.short: Security Labels that define affected resources
element.definition: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:Contract element `Contract.securityLabel` to R4:Contract element ``

binding.description: Security Labels from the Healthcare Privacy and Security Classification System.
